short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allows saving code blocks generated by ChatGPT to local files.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
CodeSnap – Instantly Save Your GPT Code Snippets 💾✨
Enhance your GPT experience with CodeSnap, the sleek Chrome extension that adds a Save button next to every code block. Effortlessly capture and organize your code snippets in one place! 🚀

🔥 Key Features:
One-Click Save: Quickly save any code section with a single click. 🖱️💾
Organized Library: Manage all your snippets in a user-friendly library. 📚🔍
💡 Perfect for Solo Entrepreneurs, Developers & Non-Coders:
Solo Entrepreneurs: Streamline your projects by keeping essential code snippets handy. 🧑‍💼💡
Solo Developers: Boost your productivity by managing your code effortlessly. 👨‍💻⚙️
Non-Coders: Easily save and reference code snippets without hassle. 🧑‍🎨✨
